verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיִקְחוּ־ <WH3947> that they bring לִ֖י תְּרוּמָ֑ה <WH8641> me an offering מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every אִישׁ֙ <WH376> of every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whose יִדְּבֶ֣נּוּ <WH5068> that giveth it willingly לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> with his heart תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> ye shall take אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמָתִֽי׃ <WH8641> my offering

וְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה <WH8641> And this [is] the offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> which ye shall take מֵאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> of them gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> and brass
וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> and goats'
וְעֹרֹ֨ת <WH5785> skins אֵילִ֧ם <WH352> And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <WH119> dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּֽים׃ <WH7848> and shittim

שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> Oil לַמָּאֹ֑ר <WH3974> for the light בְּשָׂמִים֙ <WH1314> spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <WH5561> and for sweet
אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> stones שֹׁ֕הַם <WH7718> Onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> to be set לָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> in the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> and in the breastplate
וְעָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> And let them make לִ֖י מִקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> me a sanctuary וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י <WH7931> that I may dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

כְּכֹ֗ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> According to all that I shew אוֹתְךָ֔ <WH853> אֵ֚ת <WH853> תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> thee [after] the pattern הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> of the tabernacle וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> and the pattern כָּל־ <WH3605> of all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> of all the instruments וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> so תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> thereof even so shall ye make ס

וְעָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> And they shall make אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> an ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <WH520> two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <WH2677> and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <WH753> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֤ <WH6823> And thou shalt overlay אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֔וֹר <WH2889> it with pure מִבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> within וּמִח֖וּץ <WH2351> and without תְּצַפֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6823> shalt thou overlay וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <WH6213> it and shalt make עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> and זֵ֥ר <WH2213> upon it a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְיָצַ֣קְתָּ <WH3332> And thou shalt cast לּ֗וֹ אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <WH5414> for it and put עַ֖ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> [them] in the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <WH6471> corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> thereof and two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> and צַלְעוֹ֙ <WH6763> side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> [shall be] in the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> of it and two טַבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> rings עַל־ <WH5921> and צַלְע֖וֹ <WH6763> side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> in the other
וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make בַדֵּ֖י <WH905> staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> them with gold

וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <WH935> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> into the rings עַ֖ל <WH5921> on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> of the ark לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> may be borne אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> that the ark בָּהֶֽם׃

בְּטַבְּעֹת֙ <WH2885> in the rings הָאָרֹ֔ן <WH727> of the ark יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> shall be הַבַּדִּ֑ים <WH905> The staves לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָסֻ֖רוּ <WH5493> they shall not be taken מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at

וְנָתַתָּ֖ <WH5414> And thou shalt put אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> into the ark אֵ֚ת <WH853> הָעֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> which I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make כַפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> a mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <WH753> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7341> the breadth

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two כְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> cherubims זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <WH4749> [of] beaten work תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> them in the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> of the mercy seat

וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <WH6213> And make כְּר֨וּב <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> one מִקָּצָה֙ <WH7098> on the one end מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> on the other וּכְרוּב־ <WH3742> cherub אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and the other מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> end מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> one מִן־ <WH4480> with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> [even] of the mercy seat תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> shall ye make אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> the cherubims עַל־ <WH5921> and שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> on the two קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7098> ends

וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> shall have הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <WH3742> And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <WH6566> shall stretch כְנָפַ֜יִם <WH3671> forth [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> on high סֹכְכִ֤ים <WH5526> covering בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <WH3671> with their wings עַל־ <WH5921> and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> and their faces אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> [shall look] one אֶל־ <WH413> are to be toward אָחִ֑יו <WH251> to another אֶל־ <WH413> are to be toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> toward the mercy seat יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> shall have פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> shall the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <WH3742> of the cherubims

וְנָתַתָּ֧ <WH5414> And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> the mercy seat עַל־ <WH5921> of הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> upon the ark מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> above וְאֶל־ <WH413> and הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <WH727> and in the ark תִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> that I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about

וְנוֹעַדְתִּ֣י <WH3259> And there I will meet לְךָ֮ שָׁם֒ <WH8033> There וְדִבַּרְתִּ֨י <WH1696> with thee and I will commune אִתְּךָ֜ <WH853> מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> which [are] upon הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <WH3727> with thee from above the mercy seat מִבֵּין֙ <WH996> from between שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> the two הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> cherubims אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> above אֲרֹ֣ן <WH727> the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> of the testimony אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which אֲצַוֶּ֛ה <WH6680> of all [things] which I will give thee in commandment אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> Thou shalt also make שֻׁלְחָ֖ן <WH7979> a table עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> two cubits אָרְכּוֹ֙ <WH753> [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֣ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> And thou shalt overlay אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> it with pure וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> and make לּ֛וֹ זֵ֥ר <WH2213> thereto a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make לּ֥וֹ מִסְגֶּ֛רֶת <WH4526> unto it a border טֹ֖פַח <WH2948> of an hand breadth סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <WH6213> and thou shalt make זֵר־ <WH2213> crown זָהָ֛ב <WH2091> a golden לְמִסְגַּרְתּ֖וֹ <WH4526> to the border סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> thereof round about

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make לּ֔וֹ אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> of gold וְנָתַתָּ֙ <WH5414> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> in the four הַפֵּאֹ֔ת <WH6285> corners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> that [are] on the four רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> feet

לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> Over against הַמִּסְגֶּ֔רֶת <WH4526> the border תִּהְיֶ֖יןָ <WH1961> become הַטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <WH2885> shall the rings לְבָתִּ֣ים <WH1004> be for places לְבַדִּ֔ים <WH905> of the staves לָשֵׂ֖את <WH5375> to bear אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> the table

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> the staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> wood שִׁטִּ֔ים <WH7848> [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> them with gold וְנִשָּׂא־ <WH5375> may be borne בָ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַשֻּׁלְחָֽן׃ <WH7979> that the table

וְעָשִׂ֨יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make קְּעָרֹתָ֜יו <WH7086> the dishes וְכַפֹּתָ֗יו <WH3709> thereof and spoons וּקְשׂוֹתָיו֙ <WH7184> thereof and covers וּמְנַקִּיֹּתָ֔יו <WH4518> thereof and bowls אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יֻסַּ֖ךְ <WH5258> thereof to cover בָּהֵ֑ן <WH2004> withal זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold טָה֖וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> shalt thou make אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>
וְנָתַתָּ֧ <WH5414> And thou shalt set עַֽל־ <WH5921> on הַשֻּׁלְחָ֛ן <WH7979> upon the table לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> shewbread פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> before לְפָנַ֥י <WH6440> before תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> me alway פ

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> And thou shalt make מְנֹרַ֖ת <WH4501> a candlestick זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> [of] pure מִקְשָׁ֞ה <WH4749> [of] beaten work תֵּעָשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> be made הַמְּנוֹרָה֙ <WH4501> shall the candlestick יְרֵכָ֣הּ <WH3409> his shaft וְקָנָ֔הּ <WH7070> and his branches גְּבִיעֶ֛יהָ <WH1375> his bowls כַּפְתֹּרֶ֥יהָ <WH3730> his knops וּפְרָחֶ֖יהָ <WH6525> and his flowers מִמֶּ֥נָּה <WH4480> at יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְשִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> And six קָנִ֔ים <WH7070> branches יֹצְאִ֖ים <WH3318> shall come מִצִּדֶּ֑יהָ <WH6654> out of the sides שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה ׀ <WH7969> of it three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> branches מְנֹרָ֗ה <WH4501> of the candlestick מִצִּדָּהּ֙ <WH6654> side הָאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> out of the one וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> and three קְנֵ֣י <WH7070> branches מְנֹרָ֔ה <WH4501> of the candlestick מִצִּדָּ֖הּ <WH6654> side הַשֵּׁנִֽי׃ <WH8145> out of the other
